```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(purrr)

map(1:3, function(x){
  read_csv(paste0("x (",x,").csv"), col_types = cols(.default = "c"))
}) %>% bind_rows()

tennis <- read_csv("C:/Users/gurud/Downloads/ausopen.csv")

tennis <- 
  tennis %>%
    select(-Location,-ATP, -Series, -Court, -W1, -L1, -W2, -L2, -W3, -L3, -W4, -L4,
           -W5, -L5, -Comment, -B365W, -B365L, -EXW, -EXL, -LBW, -LBL, -PSW, 
           -PSL, -MaxW, -MaxL, -AvgW, -AvgL)



tennis %>%
  filter(Round == "The Final") %>%
    select(Tournament,Date,Winner)

```
